The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 September is 292,418 (519.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 August, there were 7,430 new confirmed cases (13.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 August, there were 6,597 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 13% (833 extra cases).
